. "$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/webpreview.sh" html_header "ActionScript Framework Bundle Help" "Framework"
"$TM_SUPPORT_PATH/lib/markdown_to_help.rb" <<'EOF' # Overview
Some useful links:
[http://www.framework.org][2]
# Installation
[Download Framework][1] then unzip and move the resulting directory to a suitable location on your machine. Then let TextMate know where to find it by setting the [environmental variable](?environment_variables) `TM_FRAMEWORK_HOME` to point to it.
# Configuration Options
These environment variables allow you to define or customise the behavior of certain commands. For help on setting them up please see [TextMate help](?environment_variables).
* `TM_FRAMEWORK_HOME` The path to the Framework release on your machine.
[1]: http://www.framework.org/ [2]: http://blog.framework.org/
EOF
html_footer
